title: IAssemblyDoc.ActivateGroundPlane
description: Activates the ground plane for the specified configurations.
signature:
System.Boolean ActivateGroundPlane( 
   System.Int32
Config_opt
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configurations in which to activate a ground plane as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e : swThisConfiguration swAllConfigurations swSpecifyConfiguration

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configurations in which to activate a ground plane; valid only if Config_opt is set to swInConfiguration_e.swSpecifyConfiguration (see Remarks )

returns: True if ground plane successfully activated in the specified configurations, false if not
remarks:
To populate config_names, use
IModelDoc2::GetConfigurationNames
.
Before calling this method, use
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
to select the ground plane to activate in the specified configurations.
Only one ground plane can be active at a given time in each assembly configuration.
